post:
VPS Hosting India gives you the perfect opportunity to operate your VPS as a Dedicated Server with root access and full administration rights - all for a very low price. VPS Server can be upgraded any time as your website grows. Full root access allows you total control, as well as the ability to install custom software.

Linux VPS Hosting India plans with ultimate features and sufficient resources. Linux VPS comes with the latest dedicated IPv6 and IPv4 internet protocols. This ensures that all modern web based technologies, extensions, scripts and engines will work without any troubles.
